text: Franciszek Kornicki (18 December 1916 – 16 November 2017) was a Polish fighter pilot. He served in the Polish Air Force in Poland, France and Britain during the Second World War and later served in the Royal Air Force (RAF). Kornicki died just a few weeks short of his 101st birthday in Worthing, England of a heart attack.Zmarł Franciszek Kornicki, weteran walk powietrznych w Wielkiej Brytanii He was the last surviving Polish fighter squadron commander from the Second World War. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biographical sketch (this contains some inaccuracies) * Kornicki at Goraska air show 2010 * Press coverage of Korean edition of Kornicki's book * Video of Kornicki reunited with a Spitfire he flew during the war * Kornicki reunited with a Spitfire he flew during the war Category:1916 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish military people
title: Franciszek Kornicki
